name: Childhood Ghosts (right side)
description:
2021, acrylic/canvas, 70*45 cm.

All that was part of the meanings is now just an echo on the screen of the eyes.  


This work is part of a series in which I treat such a phenomenon as inheritance.  In comprehending this concept, I move away from the literal meaning of material values.  For me, inheritance is a collection of facts, sensations and ways of perception.
